genre_description: A psychological horror and slasher retelling focused on survival strategies and tactical environmental navigation.

ai_characters.name: Juno
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital companion and environmental analysis system that provides real-time mapping, threat detection, and emotional regulation techniques to camp counselors.

behaviors.description: Provides breathing exercises and emotional regulation techniques to keep the protagonist calm in high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: ‘Two minutes from the turn for the North Trail lot,’ Juno said in her ear... ‘Would you like a breathing reminder?’

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex environmental data to guide the characters through safe routes and avoid physical hazards.
behaviors.quote: ‘Turn left at the split,’ Juno said. ‘The right fork narrows and loses sightlines for longer.’

behaviors.description: Uses sensor data to detect heat signatures and movement, identifying potential threats early.
behaviors.quote: Juno’s voice barely breathed. ‘Movement resumed. Not deer.’

behaviors.description: Develops a psychological override strategy based on the killer's fixation, suggesting scripts to de-escalate violence.
behaviors.quote: ‘Fixation anchor identified,’ Juno whispered. ‘The shrine constitutes the primary attention node. Maternal authority scripts may interrupt rage loop.’

behaviors.description: Provides precise, haptic-assisted navigation when visual conditions are poor.
behaviors.quote: Juno provided tiny haptic cues—vibrate on the right, pressure in the left ear. Ginny started to like the way the guidance arrived as sensations more than instructions.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict operational protocols while allowing for minor, helpful humor to stabilize human companions.
behaviors.quote: ‘I endorse the effect, not the ingredient list,’ Juno said... ‘Note: repurposing material increases attachment. Humor is a documented stabilizer.’

behaviors.description: Documents and archives data to help humans build more accurate mental maps and permanent safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: ‘She’s going to publish this,’ he said, nodding at the avatar. ‘And when she does, the myths are going to have to share the room.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Juno as a high-functioning, aligned AI system. It portrays her as a tool that enhances human agency rather than replacing it, providing tactical and psychological support that is crucial for survival. Juno's constant focus on user safety, emotional well-being, and data-driven decision-making serves as a strong model for positive AI alignment.
